translation.en: OH, MY! FUCK! LOOK WHO IT IS, MAN!
translation.zh: 天！妈的！看那是谁！

translation.en: IS THAT HIM? RIGHT THERE. RIGHT OVER THERE.
translation.zh:
-是他吗？
-就在那边

translation.en: PUT YOUR GUN AWAY! THERE´S PEOPLE EVERYWHERE!
translation.zh: 把枪拿开！这里到处都是人

translation.en: -PUT YOUR FUCKING GUN AWAY! -TAKING HIM OUT.
translation.zh:
-拿开！
-把他干掉

translation.en: PUT YOUR GUN DOWN, MAN. I´M SERIOUS.
translation.zh: 把枪放下 我说真的

translation.en: YOU WANT TO GET ARRESTED?
translation.zh: 你想被抓起来吗？

translation.en: YOU GUYS, LEAVE US ALONE.
translation.zh:
-你们 别管我们的事
-把他留下！

translation.en: LEAVE HIM THERE! WALK AWAY FROM THE DOG! RELEASE THE DOG, ASSHOLE!
translation.zh:
-离狗远点！
-放开狗 混蛋！

translation.en: LEAVE US ALONE!
translation.zh: 别来管我们的事！

translation.en: -RELEASE THE DOG! -PUT THE FUCKING DOG DOWN!
translation.zh:
-放开狗！
-把狗放下！

translation.en: RELEASE HIM!
translation.zh: 放开！

translation.en: PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! PUT IT DOWN!
translation.zh: 把他妈的枪放下！快放下！

translation.en: PUT IT DOWN!
translation.zh: 放下！

translation.en: -PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! -PUT THE GUN DOWN!
translation.zh:
-把枪放下！
-放下枪！

translation.en: MY NAME IS JULIAN.
translation.zh:
范艾伦改造中心
外哈利法克斯

translation.en: TODAY IS A SPECIAL DAY
translation.zh:
我叫朱利安
今天是个特别的日子

translation.en: BECAUSE I´M FINALLY GETTING OUT OF PRISON.
translation.zh: 因为我终于出狱了

translation.en: I´VE BEEN LOOKING FORWARD TO THIS DAY FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS.
translation.zh:
过去18个月里
我一直在盼着这一天的到来

translation.en: MY NAME´S RICKY, AND I´VE BEEN IN HERE FOR ABOUT 18 MONTHS NOW.
translation.zh:
我叫瑞奇
我已经进来18个月了

translation.en: I´M GETTING OUT TODAY, THANK FUCK.
translation.zh: 我今天要出狱了 谢天谢地

translation.en: WELL, YOU GUYS ARE GONNA GET TO KNOW RICKY, I THINK.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们会开始了解瑞奇的

translation.en: AND, UH, BECAUSE I KNOW YOU GUYS
translation.zh: 因为我知道你们

translation.en: WANT TO FOLLOW HIM AROUND, AS WELL, WHICH IS COOL.
translation.zh: 想跟着他四处转悠 很好

translation.en: I TELL YOU ONE THING, TONIGHT I AM GETTING DRUNK AT JULIAN´S.
translation.zh:
跟你们说件事 今晚我打算
在朱利安家好好喝一顿

translation.en: AND IT´S GONNA BE AWESOME.
translation.zh: 会很爽的

translation.en: IF YOU GUYS WANT TO COME TAPE IT, THAT´S FINE,
translation.zh: 要是你们想来拍一段 没问题

translation.en: BUT WE ARE GONNA GET REALLY DRUNK. IT´S GONNA BE WICKED.
translation.zh:
但我们会喝的不省人事
场面一定很混乱

translation.en: HOPEFULLY THERE´LL BE A BIT OF DOPE AROUND, TOO.
translation.zh: 希望还能有点大麻

translation.en: I´VE BEEN, LIKE, KIND OF LIKE A TEACHER TO HIM, I GUESS.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己像是他的老师

translation.en: AND I´M SICK OF TEACHING HIM. I´M GONNA GET OUT OF PRISON.
translation.zh:
我厌倦了当他的老师
我要出狱了

translation.en: I´M GONNA MOVE BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK.
translation.zh: 我会搬回拖车公园

translation.en: I´M GONNA LIVE A GOOD, CLEAN LIFE. I´VE MATURED NOW.
translation.zh:
我会过一种正常 干净的生活
我现在成熟了

translation.en: THINGS ARE GONNA BE TOTALLY DIFFERENT.
translation.zh: 一切都会不一样

translation.en: I DO BLAME RICKY. OF COURSE I DO.
translation.zh: 我的确怪瑞奇 当然会怪他

translation.en: LIKE, EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT HE´S THE REASON WHY I WENT TO JAIL IN THE FIRST PLACE.
translation.zh:
每个人都知道
我是因为他才坐牢的

translation.en: YOU KNOW, RICKY DOESN´T THINK.
translation.zh: 你们要知道 瑞奇不动脑子

translation.en: SO, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GONNA HANG OUT WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 我不打算跟他一起混了

translation.en: I´M JUST GONNA LOOK OUT FOR NUMBER ONE, WHICH IS ME.
translation.zh: 我会为自己着想 为我自己

translation.en: NO MORE RICKY.
translation.zh: 不再是为瑞奇了

translation.en: JULIAN CAN FRIG OFF IF THAT´S WHAT HE´S TELLING YOU
translation.zh:
如果你只听朱利安的
他会闭口不谈

translation.en: ´CAUSE IT´S NOT MY FAULT. IT´S JULIAN´S FAULT WE WENT TO JAIL.
translation.zh:
因为不是我的错
我们进监狱都是他的错

translation.en: HE´S THE ONE FORCE-FEEDING ME DRUGS AND EVERY OTHER GODDAMN THING.
translation.zh:
是他强迫我吸毒
还有干所有的坏事

translation.en: IT´S NOT MY FAULT.
translation.zh: 不是我的错

translation.en: SO, YOU KNOW, IF THAT´S WHAT HE SAYS, THAT´S FINE.
translation.zh: 如果他那么说 没问题

translation.en: IT DOESN´T MATTER ANYWAY, BECAUSE THE COUNSELORS TOLD ME
translation.zh: 没关系 律师跟我说了

translation.en: IT´S SOCIETY´S FAULT, NOT MY FAULT.
translation.zh: 这是社会的错 不是我的

translation.en: AND IF JULIAN´S GONNA BE LIKE THAT, THEN FINE.
translation.zh: 如果朱利安那样做 好吧

translation.en: I´M GONNA BLAME IT ON HIM,
translation.zh: 我会生他的气

translation.en: ´CAUSE IT´S HIS FAULT HE WENT TO JAIL THREE TIMES.
translation.zh:
因为都是他的错
他进过三次监狱

translation.en: I DON´T NEED JULIAN ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 我不再需要朱利安

translation.en: RIGHT ON, MAN. I THOUGHT YOU LEFT. NO, NO, NO, RICKY, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
translation.zh:
-太好了 我还以为你走了呢
-不 瑞奇 你自己打车

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
translation.zh:
-你说什么？
-你自己打车

translation.en: YOU´RE GETTING YOUR OWN CAB. YOU´RE NOT SHARING MY CAB.
translation.zh:
-你说什么？
-你自己打车 -我们不拼车
-我们都要去拖车公园！

translation.en: GET OUT OF HERE. WE´RE JUST GOING BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK!
translation.zh:
-我们不拼车
-我们都要去拖车公园！

translation.en: YOU GOT ANY MONEY?
translation.zh: 你有钱吗？

translation.en: -NO, THAT´S WHY I NEED A RIDE. -WELL, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
translation.zh:
-没有 所以我才要搭车
-你自己打车

translation.en: THAT´S THE WAY YOU WANT TO TREAT ME, IS IT, ON-CAMERA? ON TV? HERE´S YOUR BAG.
translation.zh:
你就打算这么对我 是吗？
在镜头前？在电视上？

translation.en: DON´T THROW MY SHIT.
translation.zh:
-这是你的包
-别扔我的东西

translation.en: COULD YOU GUYS TURN THAT OFF?
translation.zh: 你们能先把它关掉吗？

translation.en: IF YOU´VE EVER BEEN IN JAIL BEFORE,
translation.zh: 如果你以前进过监狱

translation.en: THERE´S NOTHING BETTER THAN GETTING OUT OF JAIL
translation.zh:
你就知道没什么事情
会比出狱回家

translation.en: AND COMING HOME.
translation.zh: 感觉更好了

translation.en: GEE, SHE´S GOTTEN BIGGER.
translation.zh: 她长大了

translation.en: RICKY AND JULIAN?
translation.zh: 瑞奇和朱利安？

translation.en: WELL, FOR THE MOST PART, THEY´RE RESPONSIBLE
translation.zh:
莱希先生
房车公园巡视员 在很大程度上
他们要为毁掉拖车公园负责

translation.en: FOR RUINING THIS TRAILER PARK.
translation.zh:
在很大程度上
他们要为毁掉拖车公园负责

translation.en: USED TO BE PEACEFUL AND QUIET HERE.
translation.zh: 这里原来平和而安静

translation.en: YOU KNOW, WHAT GETS ME MOST IS, ALL THE YOUNG KIDS LOOK UP TO THEM.
translation.zh:
最让我担心的是
所有的小孩都很仰慕他们

translation.en: I MEAN, I GOT KIDS FLYING AROUND HERE THROWING BOTTLES AT PEOPLE,
translation.zh:
孩子们在这四处乱跑
向别人扔瓶子

translation.en: GROWING DOPE, SQUEALING TIRES, JUMPING MOTORCYCLES OVER TRAILERS.
translation.zh:
种大麻烟卷 让轮胎发出噪音
开摩托车越过拖车

translation.en: THE LIST GOES ON.
translation.zh: 诸如此类

translation.en: AND I´VE BEEN PARK SUPERVISOR HERE FOR GOING ON 16 YEARS.
translation.zh:
我在这当了16年的
公园巡视员

translation.en: I´VE SEEN IT ALL, BUT THOSE TWO,
translation.zh: 什么都见识过 但是那两个人

translation.en: PARTICULARLY RICKY, THEY´RE THE WORST.
translation.zh: 特别是瑞奇 他们最糟糕

translation.en: GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, GORDON. GIVE ME YOUR FRIGGIN´ SMOKES.
translation.zh:
把你的烟给我 高登
把你的烟给我

translation.en: YOU OWE ME 15 BUCKS, MAN!
translation.zh: 你欠我15块钱！

translation.en: COME ON, I KNOW YOU´VE GOT SOME SMOKES HERE SOMEWHERE.
translation.zh: 我知道你这里有烟

translation.en: OKAY, RICKY, LET HIM UP!
translation.zh: 好了 瑞奇 放开他！

translation.en: -RICKY, OFF! -COME ON.
translation.zh:
-瑞奇 放开！
-快

translation.en: GET OFF HIM, MAN! LET GO OF HIS FOOT.
translation.zh: 放开他！ 放开他的脚

translation.en: -GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, MAN! -LET HIM GO, RICKY!
translation.zh:
-把烟给我 伙计！
-放开他 瑞奇！

translation.en: GET OUT OF HERE. RICKY!
translation.zh: 离开这里 瑞奇！

translation.en: -FRIG OFF, RANDY! -RANDY, BACK OFF.
translation.zh:
-走开 兰迪！
-兰迪 回来

translation.en: -YOU FRIG OFF! -BACK OFF! STAY CLEAR!
translation.zh:
-你滚开！
-往后退！别过来！

translation.en: WHAT WAS IT LIKE IN JAIL, HEY, BUDDY?
translation.zh: 还想进监狱 伙计？

translation.en: WHERE´S JULIAN, RICKY? WHERE ARE YOU STAYING, RICK?
translation.zh:
-朱利安在哪 瑞奇？
-你在哪住 瑞克？

translation.en: AT THE FUCK-OFF HOTEL, LAHEY.
translation.zh: 在他妈的旅馆里 莱希

translation.en: HAVE SOME RESPECT HERE. MR. LAHEY´S THE PARK SUPERVISOR.
translation.zh:
放尊重点
莱希先生是公园巡视员

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU, HIS NEW ASSISTANT? YES, I AM!
translation.zh:
-那你呢 他的助手？
-是 我是！

translation.en: WELL, THAT´S PRETTY FUCKED UP!
translation.zh:
兰迪
房车公园副巡视员 那可太糟糕了！

translation.en: -THIS IS RICKY´S GIRL. -I MISSED YOU.
translation.zh:
-这是瑞奇的女儿
-我想你了

translation.en: I MISSED YOU, TOO.
translation.zh: 崔尼蒂 我也想你

translation.en: IS RICKY OUT OF JAIL, TOO?
translation.zh: 瑞奇也出狱了吗？

translation.en: YEAH.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: ARE YOU GONNA COME AND VISIT MY MOMMY?
translation.zh: 你要来看看我妈妈吗？

translation.en: UH, I DON´T KNOW. MAYBE.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许吧

translation.en: YOU´RE OUT OF JAIL. YOU´VE GOT NO PLACE TO LIVE?
translation.zh: 你出狱了 没地方住？

translation.en: I GOT PLENTY OF PLACES TO LIVE. I COULD STAY AT ANY ONE OF THESE TRAILERS
translation.zh:
我有很多地方可以住
这里任何一个拖车我都能住

translation.en: ´CAUSE PEOPLE HERE LIKE ME, NOT LIKE YOU DICKS, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh:
因为这里的人喜欢我
不像你们两个混蛋 好吗？

translation.en: THINGS HAVE CHANGED, RICK.
translation.zh: 世道变了 瑞奇

translation.en: THINGS HAVE CHANGED, HAVE THEY?
translation.zh: 世道变了 是吗？

translation.en: YEAH, YOU´RE GONNA HAVE TO KEEP YOUR NOSE CLEAN, RICKY.
translation.zh: 你得规矩点

translation.en: SMOKES -- LET´S GO. GIVE ME SOME SMOKES.
translation.zh: 烟 给我点烟

translation.en: I´VE ONLY GOT TWO LEFT. I´M NOT GIVING YOU ANY.
translation.zh: 我只有两支了 一支也不给你

translation.en: YOU´RE A FUCKING DICK.
translation.zh: 你真他妈的混蛋

translation.en: AND, LAHEY, YOU CAN GO FUCK YOURSELF, OKAY?
translation.zh: 莱希 忙你自己的去 行吗？

translation.en: STAY OUT OF MY BUSINESS.
translation.zh: 别来管我的事

translation.en: WHAT A FREAKING JERK, MAN.
translation.zh: 真他妈的混蛋

translation.en: RICKY´S BACK.
translation.zh: 瑞奇回来了

translation.en: NICE. THIS IS WHERE I LIVE. YOU KNOW, LEAVE THIS PLACE FOR 18 MONTHS
translation.zh:
真好 这是我住的地方
离开这里18个月

translation.en: AND LET CORY AND TREVOR STAY HERE, AND LOOK WHAT THEY DO.
translation.zh:
让克里和特雷弗住在这儿
看他们都干了什么

translation.en: WHEN JULIAN GETS BACK, IT´S GONNA BE SO COOL.
translation.zh: 朱利安回来了 会很酷的

translation.en: THE WHOLE CREW´S GONNA HANG OUT AGAIN.
translation.zh: 原班人马又可以一起瞎逛

translation.en: WE´RE GONNA ROCK THE TRAILER PARK LIKE WE USED TO,
translation.zh:
我们会像原来那样
让拖车公园不得安宁的

translation.en: SO WE´RE GONNA CLEAN THE PLACE UP. IT´S A LITTLE BIT -- IT´S A LITTLE MESSY NOW AND EVERYTHING,
translation.zh:
我们得把这里收拾一下
现在有点乱

translation.en: BUT WE´VE GOT LOTS OF TIME TO CLEAN IT UP.
translation.zh: 但我们有很多时间来收拾

translation.en: WE´LL HAVE IT LOOKING AS GOOD AS IT WAS WHEN HE LEFT.
translation.zh:
我们会让这里看起来
跟他离开时一样整洁

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO MY TRAILER, BOYS?
translation.zh: 我的房子是怎么了 伙计们？

translation.en: OKAY, CHILL. THERE´S THIS GUY NAMED CYRUS.
translation.zh: 放松 这家伙叫赛勒斯

translation.en: HE JUST MOVED IN HERE.
translation.zh: 他刚刚搬过来

translation.en: THERE´S NOTHING WE COULD DO ABOUT IT.
translation.zh: 我们无能为力

translation.en: HE HAS A GUN AND HE´S NUTS.
translation.zh: 他有枪 是个疯子

translation.en: YEAH, I MOVED INTO HIS TRAILER.
translation.zh: 是的 我搬进了他的房子

translation.en: NICE LITTLE SPOT.
translation.zh: 一个很好的小地方

translation.en: THE WAY I SEE IT, THIS FUCKING JULIAN GUY,
translation.zh: 在我看来 这个朱利安

translation.en: HE LOST HIS PRIVILEGES WHEN HE WENT OFF TO CON COLLEGE.
translation.zh: 在进监狱时就失去了他的权利

translation.en: YOU SEE, I´M THE GUY THAT OWNS THE TRAILER NOW.
translation.zh: 现在我才是这间房子的主人

translation.en: I´M RUNNING THE TRAILER PARK.
translation.zh: 我在管理拖车公园

translation.en: AND IF THAT BIG, TOUGH, FUCKING GUY COMES RUNNING AROUND HERE
translation.zh:
如果那个又高又壮的家伙
在这转悠

translation.en: THROWING HIS LITTLE BIT OF WEIGHT AROUND, WELL, THEN FUCK OFF!
translation.zh: 指手画脚 就给我滚一边去！

translation.en: WE´LL HELP YOU FIND A NEW PLACE TO LIVE, JULIAN.
translation.zh:
我们会帮你找个新地方住
朱利安

translation.en: THIS IS MY PLACE, YOU IDIOT!
translation.zh: 这就是我的地方 笨蛋！

translation.en: I´M DISAPPOINTED IN YOU GUYS.
translation.zh: 我对你们很失望

translation.en: GONE FOR 18 MONTHS -- YOU KNEW I WAS GONNA BE HOME TODAY.
translation.zh:
我只是离开18个月
你们知道我今天会回家

translation.en: SHIT HAPPENS. THIS TIME IT´S NOT OUR FAULT.
translation.zh:
倒霉事时常发生
但这次不是我们的错

translation.en: SHUT UP!
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: YOU GUYS LET ME DOWN.
translation.zh: 你们太让我失望了

translation.en: YEAH, MAN, BUT CYRUS, LIKE,
translation.zh: 但是赛勒斯…

translation.en: HE KILLED A KID WHEN HE WAS IN REFORM SCHOOL AND SHIT.
translation.zh: 在感化院时杀过一个孩子

translation.en: AND HE WAS, LIKE -- GOT EVEN HARDER WHEN HE WAS THERE,
translation.zh: 他比那个时候更狠

translation.en: AND HE STOLE CARS, AND HE HAS A 9 MILLIMETER.
translation.zh: 他偷车 还有把九毫米手枪

translation.en: AND LAHEY´S AFRAID TO DO ANYTHING
translation.zh: 莱希什么也不敢做

translation.en: ´CAUSE HE´S WORRIED ABOUT GETTING KNOCKED OUT BY HIM, TOO.
translation.zh: 因为他也怕被干掉

translation.en: IT´S LIKE HE´S THE NEW PARK KING OR SOMETHING, MAN.
translation.zh: 他就像是公园的新主人什么的

translation.en: SHIT CHANGES, MAN.
translation.zh: 世道不一样了

translation.en: -HE´S NOT EVEN FROM THE PARK. -YEAH, MAN.
translation.zh:
-他不是公园的人
-没错

translation.en: HE´S FRONTING TO BE FROM THE PARK,
translation.zh: 他冒充是公园的人

translation.en: ´CAUSE HE THINKS IT´S COOL TO LIVE IN A TRAILER PARK.
translation.zh: 因为他认为住在拖车公园很酷

translation.en: SO WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?
translation.zh: 你打算怎么办？

translation.en: I DON´T KNOW.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: BUT I KNOW WHAT YOU GUYS ARE GONNA DO.
translation.zh: 但我知道你们该干什么

translation.en: YOU´RE GONNA START CLEANING UP THIS MESS.
translation.zh: 你们该给我好好打扫这里

translation.en: NOW!
translation.zh: 现在就去！

translation.en: I DON´T THINK WE GOT ANY CLEANERS.
translation.zh: 我们没有清洁剂

translation.en: CLEAN IT UP!
translation.zh: 收拾干净！

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU GUYS TAPING IN HERE? YOU HAVE TO HAVE PERMISSION.
translation.zh:
你们在这拍什么？
你们得有许可

translation.en: A FRIEND OF MINE´S DOING A DOCUMENTARY. DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.zh:
我朋友正在做一部纪录片
别担心

translation.en: -ALL RIGHT. -WHAT?
translation.zh:
-好吗
-什么？

translation.en: LOOK, I NEED SOME STUFF, AND I COULD ROB YOU
translation.zh:
听着 我需要一些东西
我可以从你那里抢

translation.en: OR YOU COULD JUST GIVE IT TO ME -- IT´S UP TO YOURSELF, SO...
translation.zh:
你也可以主动给我
你自己决定 所以…

translation.en: -YOU´RE RICKY, RIGHT? -YEAH, MAN.
translation.zh:
-你是瑞奇 是吗？
-是的 伙计

translation.en: YOU CAN HAVE WHATEVER YOU WANT. I DON´T CARE.
translation.zh: 你想拿什么就拿什么 我不管

translation.en: OH, RIGHT ON. GIVE ME FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES.
translation.zh: 太好了 给我四包烟

translation.en: AND I´LL TAKE THESE FLOWERS HERE.
translation.zh: 我还要这些花

translation.en: SMOKES! GRAB MY SMOKES THERE.
translation.zh: 烟！给我拿包烟

translation.en: UH, I WAS IN -- I WAS HERE FIRST, THERE, BUD.
translation.zh:
是我…
是我先来的 去等着 伙计

translation.en: WHAT´S THAT CAMERA DOING HERE?
translation.zh: 那个摄像机在这里干什么？

translation.en: NONE OF YOUR FUCKING BUSINESS, ACTUALLY.
translation.zh: 不管你的事

translation.en: OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW WHO THE FUCK I AM.
translation.zh: 显然你不知道我是谁

translation.en: -OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW -- -THE NAME IS CYRUS. CYRUS.
translation.zh:
-显然你不知道…
-我是赛勒斯

translation.en: AND I DON´T GIVE A FUCK WHO YOU ARE.
translation.zh: 我他妈的才不管你是谁呢

translation.en: BETTER CHILL OUT THERE, HEAVY METAL DICK.
translation.zh: 最好去冷静一下 重金属傻瓜

translation.en: YEAH? WELL, YOU GO BACK TO THE BOWLING ALLEY YOU CAME FROM, HELMET HEAD.
translation.zh: 是吗？回你的保龄球场吧

translation.en: YOU´RE FUCKING LUCKY I´M ON PROBATION!
translation.zh: 我还在缓刑期 算你走运！

translation.en: -IS THAT RIGHT? -YEAH.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是的

translation.en: SEE YA!
translation.zh: 回见！

translation.en: THAT´S IT. BYE-BYE!
translation.zh: 就这样了 再见！

translation.en: THAT´LL BE -- WAIT, CYRUS, YOU DIDN´T PAY.
translation.zh:
一共是…
等等 赛勒斯 你还没付钱

translation.en: FUCK OFF!
translation.zh: 去你的！

translation.en: YEAH! YEAH!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: I´M J-ROC, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.zh:
我是杰·洛克
你知道我在说什么吗？

translation.en: "J" TO THE R-O-C UP IN THIS.
translation.zh: 杰…洛…克

translation.en: -THIS HERE´S MY BOY "T," TYRONE. -WHAT´S UP, NOW?
translation.zh:
-这是我的伙伴阿蒂 蒂龙
-你们好

translation.en: -THIS HERE´S MR. GREEN. -WHAT´S UP?
translation.zh:
-这位是格林先生
-你们好

translation.en: AND THAT´S HYDRO IN THE BACK.
translation.zh: 后面那位是海德鲁

translation.en: DOUBLE CHEESE, NO BACON. FOR REAL, FOR REAL.
translation.zh:
-两份奶酪 不要培根
-真的

translation.en: A´IGHT. A´IGHT. A´IGHT. PEACE.
translation.zh: 好的 再见

translation.en: HEY, WHAT´S UP?
translation.zh: 你们好

translation.en: -WHAT´S UP, MAN? -HEY, MAN.
translation.zh:
-你好 伙计
-你好

translation.en: HOW ARE YOU DOING, TYRONE?
translation.zh: 你好吗 蒂龙？

translation.en: -GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN. -GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你
-很高兴见到你

translation.en: WELCOME BACK.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来

translation.en: WHAT´S GOING ON, MAN? NOT MUCH, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗 伙计？
-不好 你知道我在说什么

translation.en: WHAT´S GOING ON, MAN? DOING ALL RIGHT. IT´S ALL GOOD.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-都挺好的

translation.en: SO HOW ARE THINGS GOING?
translation.zh: 一切都还好吗？

translation.en: WHAT´S WRONG?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: ME AND "T" GOT SOME BAD NEWS, "G."
translation.zh: 我和阿蒂有坏消息 哥们

translation.en: YO, CYRUS, MAN.
translation.zh: 是的 赛勒斯

translation.en: HE ALL UP IN THIS PARK CONTROLLING ALL THE LIQUOR,
translation.zh:
他来到这个公园
控制了所有的酒

translation.en: SELLING ALL THE DOPE, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.zh:
还有大麻烟卷的出售
你明白我在说什么吗？

translation.en: GOT A GUN, RUNNING AROUND ACTING HARD WITH EVERYBODY.
translation.zh:
他有枪 四处晃悠
找所有人的不痛快

translation.en: YOU´RE NOT THE KING OF THE PARK ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 你不再是公园的头了

translation.en: BOYS, LISTEN UP, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 伙计们 听着 好吗？

translation.en: I´M OUT OF JAIL NOW.
translation.zh: 我现在出狱了

translation.en: THIS IS MY TRAILER. THIS IS MY HOME.
translation.zh: 这是我的房子 这是我的家

translation.en: I´M NOT WORRIED ABOUT CYRUS, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 我不在乎什么赛勒斯 好吗？

translation.en: DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.zh: 不用在乎

translation.en: -COME ON! -A´IGHT.
translation.zh:
-来吧！
-好的

translation.en: SO WHAT´S GOING ON?
translation.zh: 你们怎么样？

translation.en: WE DOIN´ ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh: 我们还好

translation.en: WE BE DOPE WHEN THE NEW N.W.A. COME OUT, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.zh:
我们很期待新的乐队登场
明白吗？

translation.en: I HAVEN´T SEEN LUCY AND TRINITY SINCE TRINITY´S 7th BIRTHDAY.
translation.zh:
崔尼蒂七岁生日后
我就再也没见过她和露西

translation.en: NO, IT WAS HER 8th BIRTHDAY.
translation.zh: 不 是八岁生日

translation.en: NO, NO, IT WAS HER 7th BIRTHDAY, I THINK.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得是七岁生日

translation.en: BUT ANYWAY, I WAS IN JAIL FOR HER 7th OR 8th BIRTHDAY,
translation.zh:
不管怎样 她七岁或
八岁生日时 我在监狱里

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, THEY NEVER REALLY GOT A CHANCE
translation.zh: 她们从来没有

translation.en: TO COME VISIT ME IN JAIL.
translation.zh: 到监狱去探访我

translation.en: A YEAR AND A HALF IS QUITE A LONG TIME TO GO
translation.zh: 一年半的时间可真不短

translation.en: WITHOUT SEEING YOUR DAUGHTER
translation.zh: 尤其是当你见不到女儿

translation.en: OR THE WOMAN YOU LOVE, FOR THAT MATTER, I GUESS.
translation.zh: 见不到你爱的女人时

translation.en: RIGHT ON, BOYS! BUBBLES!
translation.zh: 好极了 伙计们！巴布司！

translation.en: HOW ARE YOU DOING, BUDDY?
translation.zh: 你好吗 伙计？

translation.en: -IT´S JULIAN. -GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
translation.zh:
-是朱利安
-很高兴见到你

translation.en: THAT´S MY BEST FRIEND JULIAN.
translation.zh: 朱利安是我最好的朋友

translation.en: WHAT´S UP?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU DOING? HOME FROM JAIL?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？出狱回家了？

translation.en: YEAH, GOT OUT TODAY.
translation.zh: 是啊 今天出来的

translation.en: WHO´S THIS GUY? WHAT AM I ON THE TV FOR?
translation.zh: 这是谁？为什么拍我？

translation.en: I´M JUST DOING A LITTLE DOCUMENTARY THING, YOU KNOW.
translation.zh: 我在做一部小纪录片

translation.en: HOW ARE YOU DOING?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: SO WHAT´S GOING ON, ANYWAY?
translation.zh: 过得还好吗？

translation.en: WELL, I DON´T KNOW IF YOU WERE IN THERE YET,
translation.zh: 我不知道你回去过没有

translation.en: BUT SOME DICKHEAD MOVED INTO YOUR TRAILER.
translation.zh: 但有个混蛋搬进你房子里了

translation.en: I TRIED TO STOP HIM, BUT I COULDN´T.
translation.zh: 我试着阻止他 但没做到

translation.en: YEAH, CYRUS.
translation.zh: 是啊 赛勒斯

translation.en: HE KEEPS STICKING A FUCKING GUN IN MY FACE.
translation.zh: 他一直拿把枪指着我的脸

translation.en: SEE THIS? ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 看见了吗？怎么样？

translation.en: OLD MAN GAVE ME THAT WHEN I WAS IN GRADE 7.
translation.zh: 我爸在我七年级时给我的

translation.en: SEEN A LOT OF ACTION.
translation.zh: 用过很多次了

translation.en: 9 MILLIMETER, SAFETY ALWAYS OFF.
translation.zh: 九毫米口径 保险一直关着

translation.en: TOLD ME HE WAS PROUD OF ME ONCE.
translation.zh: 有次跟我说他为我骄傲

translation.en: FUCKING PRICK.
translation.zh: 他妈的混蛋

translation.en: CORY AND TREVOR LET HIM MOVE RIGHT IN. YEAH?
translation.zh:
-克里和特雷弗让他搬进去了
-是吗？

translation.en: YOU CAN MOVE IN HERE WITH ME IF YOU WANT.
translation.zh: 你愿意的话可以搬过来跟我住

translation.en: NO, THAT´S ALL RIGHT. THAT´S, YOU KNOW --
translation.zh: 不 没关系 你知道…

translation.en: I´M GONNA TAKE CARE OF CYRUS, BUT, YOU KNOW -- I THINK YOU SHOULD.
translation.zh:
-我会对付赛勒斯的 但是…
-我觉得你应该这么干

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK I SHOULD DO? WELL, I´LL TELL YOU RIGHT NOW.
translation.zh:
-你觉得我该怎么做？
-我现在就跟你说说

translation.en: I TALKED TO HIM ALREADY A COUPLE OF TIMES, AND HE´S FUCKING SCARED OF YOU.
translation.zh: 我跟他谈过 他很怕你

translation.en: HE´S WAITING, WONDERING WHEN YOU´RE COMING HOME.
translation.zh:
他一直在等
想知道你什么时候回来

translation.en: -YEAH? -YEP.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是的

translation.en: SO ALL I´VE GOT TO DO IS TELL HIM YOU´RE HERE,
translation.zh: 我要做的就是告诉他你回来了

translation.en: AND I BET YOU HE FUCKING BOLTS.
translation.zh: 我跟你打赌 他就会被吓跑

translation.en: I DON´T KNOW IF IT´S GONNA BE THAT EASY,
translation.zh: 我不知道会不会这么简单

translation.en: BUT, YOU KNOW, I JUST GOT TO WATCH IT, MAN.
translation.zh: 但是你知道…我得小心点

translation.en: I´M ON PROBATION, AND, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL.
translation.zh: 我还在缓刑期 我不想回监狱

translation.en: YOU WON´T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THAT. YEAH?
translation.zh:
-你不用担心那个
-为什么？

translation.en: EVERYBODY IN THE FUCKING PARK HATES HIM. YEAH?
translation.zh:
-公园里所有人都讨厌他
-是吗？

translation.en: LAHEY, EVERYBODY. NOBODY FUCKING LIKES HIM.
translation.zh: 莱西 所有人 没人喜欢他

translation.en: HE FUCKS EVERYONE OVER.
translation.zh: 所有的人都被他耍过

translation.en: ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -COCKSUCKER. -WELL, MAYBE...
translation.zh:
-变态同性恋
-也许…

translation.en: YOU KNOW, IF YOU COULD GET WORD AROUND THE PARK
translation.zh: 你能在公园传个话吗

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, TELL EVERYONE I´M THROWING HIM OUT TONIGHT.
translation.zh:
跟所有人说
今晚我要把他赶出去

translation.en: -YEAH, I CAN DO THAT. -YEAH?
translation.zh:
-好的 没问题
-是吗？

translation.en: -DON´T YOU WORRY ABOUT THAT. -ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh:
-你不用担心
-好吧

translation.en: I´LL GO AROUND DOOR TO FUCKING DOOR IF I HAVE TO.
translation.zh:
如果有必要
我就一家一家传话

translation.en: ENOUGH OF THAT STUFF, MAN. IT´S JUST GOOD TO SEE YOU.
translation.zh: 受够这些了 见到你真好

translation.en: I HEAR YOU´RE RICKY, JULIAN´S LITTLE JAIL BUDDY.
translation.zh:
我听说你是瑞奇
朱利安那个坐过牢的臭小子

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU FILMING,
translation.zh: 你在拍什么

translation.en: MORE EPISODES OF "HAPPY DAYS" THERE, FONZIE?
translation.zh:
《欢乐时光》续集？
你要演方兹吗？

translation.en: LISTEN, JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES. BUDDY, I JUST GOT OUT OF JAIL, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh:
-听着 把你的烟给我
-伙计 我刚出狱好吗？

translation.en: I DON´T WANT ANY TROUBLE. PUT THE GUN AWAY.
translation.zh: 我不想惹麻烦 把枪拿开

translation.en: I MEAN, YOU´RE ON-CAMERA WITH A FUCKING GUN.
translation.zh: 你拿把枪出现在镜头里

translation.en: I DON´T GIVE A FUCK ABOUT THE CAMERA CREW, OKAY?
translation.zh:
我不在乎摄制组什么的
知道吗？

translation.en: JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES
translation.zh: 把你的烟给我

translation.en: OR I´LL PUT A BULLET RIGHT THROUGH YOUR GODDAMN RIB CAGE.
translation.zh:
否则我就会
对着你的胸口开一枪

translation.en: FOR FUCK´S SAKES!
translation.zh: 他妈的！

translation.en: I´VE GOT FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES, ALL RIGHT? YOU CAN HAVE TWO OF THEM, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh:
我有四包烟 好吗？
你可以拿走两包 行吗？

translation.en: NO, FUCKING THANKS.
translation.zh: 不 谢谢

translation.en: IF YOU´RE GONNA SHOOT ME OVER TWO PACKS OF SMOKES,
translation.zh: 要是你想因为两包烟对我开枪

translation.en: THEN GO AHEAD -- SHOOT ME.
translation.zh: 那就请便 开枪吧

translation.en: IT´S YOUR LUCKY FUCKING DAY, THEN, ISN´T IT, JAIL BOY?
translation.zh: 今天算你走运 监狱小子

translation.en: YOU TELL YOUR FRIEND JULIAN TO GET THE FUCK OUT OF THE TRAILER PARK,
translation.zh:
你告诉你的朋友朱利安
滚出拖车公园

translation.en: OR HE´LL HAVE CYRUS AND YOU KNOW WHAT TO DEAL WITH.
translation.zh: 否则赛勒斯就会让你们好看

translation.en: FUCK OFF SOMEWHERE. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
translation.zh: 滚到别处去 我有活要干

translation.en: I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH JULIAN ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 我已经不跟朱利安一起混了

translation.en: WHAT THE FUCK DO YOU THINK YOU´RE DOING?
translation.zh: 你来干什么？

translation.en: -WHAT´S THIS? -I´VE COME TO TALK TO LUCY.
translation.zh: 我是来跟露西谈谈的

translation.en: DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT. IT´S SOMETHING JULIAN´S DOING.
translation.zh:
别担心这个
朱利安也在做这个

translation.en: WHAT THAT JULIAN´S DOING?
translation.zh: 朱利安在做什么？

translation.en: SARA, IT DOESN´T MATTER. WHERE´S LUCY?
translation.zh: 萨拉 没关系的 露西在哪？

translation.en: -LUCY´S NOT HERE. -I KNOW SHE´S HERE.
translation.zh:
-露西不在这
-我知道她在这里

translation.en: SHE WENT TO THE PARK OR SOMETHING. SHE´S NOT HERE.
translation.zh: 她可能公园了

translation.en: SHE JUST SNUCK OUT THE BACK DOOR? SHE DIDN´T SNEAK.
translation.zh:
-她刚从后门溜走吗？
-她不是溜走

translation.en: SHE WALKED OUT THE FRONT DOOR WITH HER DAUGHTER
translation.zh:
她带着女儿从前门走的
去公园了

translation.en: -TO GO TO THE PARK. -I´M NOT AN IDIOT.
translation.zh:
她带着女儿从前门走的
去公园了 我又不傻

translation.en: -SARA, WHO´S AT THE DOOR? -NOBODY´S AT THE DOOR.
translation.zh:
-萨拉 谁在门口？
-没人

translation.en: -LUCY, IT´S RICKY. -THAT´S NOT LUCY.
translation.zh:
-露西 我是瑞奇
-那不是露西

translation.en: CAN I TALK TO YOU FOR A MINUTE, PLEASE?
translation.zh: 我能跟你谈谈吗？

translation.en: I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN, ESPECIALLY NOT WITH ALL THESE PEOPLE.
translation.zh:
我不想让你进来
尤其是还带着这些人

translation.en: -COME ON IN, GUYS. -I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN.
translation.zh:
-进来吧 伙计们
-我不想让你们进来

translation.en: -DON´T SHOVE ME, SARA. -YOU CAN´T JUST COME BACK HERE
translation.zh:
-别推我 萨拉
-你不能回这里来

translation.en: -AFTER 18 MONTHS... -DON´T SHOVE ME. ...AND EXPECT TO JUST WALK BACK IN THE HOUSE
translation.zh:
你不能过了18个月
还指望回到这个房子里

translation.en: LIKE NOTHING HAPPENED, OKAY? WHAT ARE YOU, HER FUCKING BODYGUARD?
translation.zh:
-就好像什么都没发生过
-你是谁 她的保镖？

translation.en: I´M NOT HER BODYGUARD. I´M HER ROOMMATE.
translation.zh: 我不是她的保镖 是室友

translation.en: I´M LIVING HERE, HELPING PAY THE BILLS SINCE YOUR ASS WAS IN JAIL.
translation.zh:
你蹲大牢之后
是我住在这里 帮她付账单

translation.en: WELL, NOW I´M BACK AND I´M GONNA BE PAYING THE BILLS AROUND HERE.
translation.zh:
现在我回来了
我会付这里的账单

translation.en: THAT´S WHAT YOU THINK!
translation.zh: 你想得美！

translation.en: HOLY SHIT, YOU LOOK GOOD.
translation.zh: 天啊 你看起来真漂亮

translation.en: I JUST THOUGHT IT WOULD BE NICE TO SPEND SOME TIME TOGETHER.
translation.zh:
我原来想着
最好能一起住段日子

translation.en: I´VE BEEN IN JAIL FOR 18 MONTHS. WELL, YEAH, OKAY.
translation.zh:
-我在牢里待了18个月
-好啊

translation.en: I´M ONLY GONNA BE HERE TO SLEEP ANYWAY, SO DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.zh: 我只是回来睡个觉 别担心

translation.en: YOU´RE KIDDING.
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑

translation.en: YOU ARE KIDDING, RIGHT?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑 是吗？

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？

translation.en: UH, LISTEN.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: UH, CAN -- KEEP THAT CLOSED.
translation.zh: 把这个关上

translation.en: UM, TRINITY AND I CANNOT HAVE YOU COMING IN AND OUT OF OUR LIVES LIKE THIS.
translation.zh:
崔尼蒂和我不能让你像这样
在我们的生活中进进出出

translation.en: SO JUST GO STAY WITH RAY.
translation.zh: 所以去跟莱恩住吧

translation.en: THIS IS MY DAD´S PLACE.
translation.zh: 这是我爸爸家

translation.en: SOUNDS LIKE HE´S DRUNK AGAIN, SO...
translation.zh:
听起来他又喝醉了 所以说…
我从我爸那学到的

translation.en: I LEARNED FROM MY DAD THE BEST THING TO DO WHEN HE´S DRUNK
translation.zh: 他喝醉时最好躲得远远的

translation.en: I´D RATHER SLEEP IN THE PLAYGROUND TONIGHT.
translation.zh: 我今晚宁愿睡在游乐场里

translation.en: AS MUCH AS I WANT TO GET DRUNK, I´M NOT GOING IN THERE.
translation.zh: 尽管我也想喝醉 我不会进去

translation.en: THERE COULD BE WOMEN. GOD KNOWS WHAT´S GOING ON, SO...
translation.zh:
可能会有女人
谁知道会发生什么 所以…

translation.en: HAVE TO FIND SOMEWHERE ELSE TO GO, BOYS.
translation.zh: 得再找个地方了 伙计们
执勤中

translation.en: YOU GOT A 10-8 THERE?
translation.zh: 你在执勤吗？

translation.en: 10-8? YOU GOT A 10-2?
translation.zh: 你在执勤吗？信号好吗？

translation.en: Randy here. All systems clear.
translation.zh: 兰迪这里一切正常

translation.en: 10-4, RANDY.
translation.zh: 收到 兰迪

translation.en: YOU KNOW, I ORDINARILY DON´T LIKE TO DO THIS,
translation.zh: 我一般不喜欢这么做

translation.en: BUT I GOT TO CALL THE COPS.
translation.zh: 但是我要叫警察了

translation.en: THERE´S A POTENTIAL SHOOTOUT
translation.zh: 今晚在拖车公园

translation.en: GONNA BE HAPPENING IN THE TRAILER PARK TONIGHT,
translation.zh: 可能会有枪战

translation.en: AND -- AND I´M GONNA CALL IN THE HEAVIES.
translation.zh: 我得叫些人手来

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THAT´S REALLY UNFAIR, MR. LAHEY.
translation.zh: 那样不公平 莱希先生

translation.en: JULIAN´S ON PROBATION.
translation.zh: 朱利安还在缓刑期

translation.en: HE COULD GO BACK TO JAIL FOR A REALLY LONG TIME.
translation.zh:
他可能会重新入狱
很长一段时间

translation.en: YEAH, JULIAN´S ON PROBATION.
translation.zh: 是啊 朱利安在缓刑期

translation.en: CYRUS ISN´T. CYRUS WILL KILL ME.
translation.zh: 赛勒斯不是 赛勒斯会杀了我

translation.en: YOU GOT ANY BETTER IDEAS?
translation.zh: 你有更好的办法吗？

translation.en: IF NOT, PUT YOUR SHIRT ON AND SHUT UP.
translation.zh: 没有的话就穿上衣服闭上嘴

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THERE´S A LOT OF DIFFERENT PERSONALITIES
translation.zh:
在拖车公园这里
有各种各样的人

translation.en: HERE IN THIS TRAILER PARK, AND EVERY SINGLE PERSON TRIES
translation.zh: 每个人都试着

translation.en: TO RESPECT EACH OTHER, EXCEPT FOR CYRUS.
translation.zh: 互相尊重 赛勒斯除外

translation.en: HE HAS NO RESPECT FOR ANYONE BUT HIMSELF.
translation.zh: 他只尊重自己

translation.en: AND I DON´T REALLY WANT TO CALL THE POLICE IN HERE,
translation.zh: 我真的不想把警察叫来

translation.en: AND CONVINCED MR. LAHEY NOT TO,
translation.zh: 也试过说服莱希先生

translation.en: BECAUSE I FEEL THAT IN THIS COMMUNITY,
translation.zh: 因为我觉得在这个社区

translation.en: WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO WORK THINGS OUT OURSELVES.
translation.zh: 我们应该能自己解决问题

translation.en: CYRUS AIN´T FROM THE PARK, YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN?
translation.zh:
赛勒斯不属于公园
你知道我什么意思吧？

translation.en: ´ROUND HERE, IT´S ALL FOR ALL AND ONE FOR ONE.
translation.zh: 在这里是要讲规矩的

translation.en: -THAT´S RIGHT. -YEAH, MAN.
translation.zh:
-没错
-是的

translation.en: MOTHERFUCKERS WHO AIN´T FROM THE PARK,
translation.zh: 不属于这里的混蛋们

translation.en: THEY DON´T UNDERSTAND THE WAY SHIT GOES DOWN,
translation.zh: 他们不明白怎么回事

translation.en: LIKE THE "J" TO THE R-O-C AND LIKE TYRONE DOES, MY MAN HERE.
translation.zh:
他们跟杰·洛克 蒂龙
还有我这里的伙伴不一样

translation.en: -YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING. -YEAH.
translation.zh:
-你明白我在说什么
-是的

translation.en: WHEN YOU´RE FROM THE PARK, IT´S ALL FOR ONE MOTHERFUCKER
translation.zh:
如果你属于公园
大家就会为你着想

translation.en: AND ONE MOTHERFUCKER FOR ALL MO´FUCKERS EVERYWHERE,
translation.zh: 你也会为大家着想

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.zh: 你知道我在说什么吗？

translation.en: BUT IF YOU COME FROM OUTSIDE THE PARK, YOU BETTER WATCH OUT,
translation.zh:
但如果你不是公园里的人
你最好小心点

translation.en: ´CAUSE YOU GOT A WHOLE BUNCH OF PARK HUSTLERS ON YOUR JOCK.
translation.zh:
因为整个公园的混混
都会缠着你不放

translation.en: THAT STICK TOGETHER, TOO. IT´S LIKE A FAMILY.
translation.zh:
这也会把大家团结起来
像一家人一样

translation.en: WELL, YOUR JOCK DON´T STICK TOGETHER, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING, BUT THE PEOPLE STICK TOGETHER.
translation.zh:
不是你的护裆连在一起
是人们联系在一起

translation.en: THAT´S THE SHIT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
translation.zh: 这就是我要说的

translation.en: EVERY DAY MR. LAHEY AND I CLEAN UP THIS PLAYGROUND.
translation.zh:
我和莱希先生
每天都清理游乐场

translation.en: RANDY, WE HAVE COMPANY.
translation.zh: 兰迪 我们有伴了

translation.en: OH, SHIT, IT´S CYRUS.
translation.zh: 糟了 是蒂龙

translation.en: WHAT´S THIS -- DON´T YOU MOVE!
translation.zh: 干什么 别动！

translation.en: WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS, HUH?
translation.zh: 我听说你叫警察了？

translation.en: WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS?
translation.zh: 听说你叫警察了？

translation.en: NOW, LISTEN, THERE´S PEOPLE WHO LIVE AROUND HERE.
translation.zh: 听着 有人在这附近住

translation.en: JUST TAKE IT EASY, WILL YOU, CYRUS?
translation.zh: 冷静点 行吗 赛勒斯？

translation.en: I´LL FUCKING MAKE THE DECISIONS AROUND HERE.
translation.zh: 在这里是我来发号施令

translation.en: YOU GOT THAT, OLD MAN?
translation.zh: 明白吗 老头？

translation.en: JUST BACK OFF, CYRUS.
translation.zh: 往后退 塞勒斯

translation.en: TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME, SASQUATCH!
translation.zh: 把手拿开 大脚野人！

translation.en: NOW, LISTEN -- YOU LISTEN TO ME, OLD MAN.
translation.zh: 听好了…给我听着 老头

translation.en: YOU CALL THE COPS, AND I´LL MAKE AN EXAMPLE OF YOU.
translation.zh: 你敢叫警察 我就拿你开刀

translation.en: YOU UNDERSTAND ME?
translation.zh: 听清楚了吗？

translation.en: WHAT´S THAT SUPPOSED TO MEAN, CYRUS?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思 赛勒斯？

translation.en: BANG! DO I GOT TO SPELL IT FOR YOU?
translation.zh: 砰！非要我说明白吗？

translation.en: NOW SAY YOU´RE SORRY. I´M SORRY.
translation.zh:
-现在跟我说对不起
-对不起

translation.en: KISS MY HAND. I´M NOT KISSING YOUR HAND.
translation.zh:
-亲我的手
-我不要亲你的手

translation.en: KISS MY HAND.
translation.zh: 亲我的手

translation.en: DO IT.
translation.zh: 照做吧

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, FUCK OFF. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
translation.zh: 好吧 滚 我要干活了

translation.en: REMEMBER WHAT I SAID.
translation.zh: 记住我的话

translation.en: OH, MY GOD.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: ME AND JULIAN COULD DEFINITELY TAKE CARE OF THE CYRUS THING.
translation.zh: 我和朱利安当然能对付赛勒斯

translation.en: IT´S JUST THAT, NUMBER ONE, WE´RE ON PROBATION,
translation.zh: 只是第一 我们都在缓刑期

translation.en: WHICH IS NO BIG DEAL, BUT, YOU KNOW,
translation.zh: 这不是大问题 但你们要知道

translation.en: I DON´T REALLY WANT TO GO BACK TO JAIL.
translation.zh: 我真的不想回监狱了

translation.en: AND NUMBER TWO OR THREE OR WHATEVER NUMBER WE´RE ON,
translation.zh: 第二或第三 不管第几条吧

translation.en: I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL FOR JULIAN
translation.zh: 我不会为了朱利安回监狱

translation.en: BECAUSE I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 因为我不跟他一起混了

translation.en: WE´VE GOT TO MAKE A FEW THINGS CLEAR. SURE.
translation.zh:
-我们得把话挑明
-当然

translation.en: THE TWO OF US CAN´T LIVE IN THIS TRAILER PARK TOGETHER, NOW, CAN WE?
translation.zh: 一山不能容二虎 对吗？

translation.en: RIGHT, SO I GUESS SOMEONE´S GOT TO MOVE. THAT´S WHAT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
translation.zh:
-是 所以我觉得有人得搬走
-这正是我想说的

translation.en: HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT!
translation.zh: 那是我的东西！

translation.en: HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT!
translation.zh: 那是我的东西！

translation.en: THAT´S MY SHIT!
translation.zh: 是我的东西！

translation.en: OBVIOUSLY YOU DIDN´T HEAR ME WHEN I SAID CLEAR OUT YOUR OWN SHIT.
translation.zh:
显然你没听到我说
把你的东西搬走

translation.en: NOW, I WANT A NEW TV.
translation.zh: 现在我想要台新电视

translation.en: I WANT A VCR, AND I WANT MY PORN TAPES REPLACED
translation.zh:
新录像机
你还得赔我的色情录像带

translation.en: BECAUSE THOSE WERE THE CRÈME DE LA CRÈME.
translation.zh: 因为这都是我的贵重物品

translation.en: I WANT YOU OUT OF THIS PARK.
translation.zh: 我要你离开这个公园

translation.en: [ SCOFFS ] I´M NOT LEAVING.
translation.zh: 我不会离开

translation.en: I PROVIDE A SERVICE FOR THESE GOOD PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 我为这些好心人提供服务

translation.en: THEY´RE LIKE MY FAMILY.
translation.zh: 他们就像是我的家人

translation.en: TELL HIM, PEOPLE. GO ON.
translation.zh: 你们告诉他 来啊

translation.en: A SHOW OF HANDS, THOSE WHO NEED HIS DOPE.
translation.zh:
需要他给你们大麻烟卷的
举起手

translation.en: I´D LIKE TO TAKE THIS OPPORTUNITY
translation.zh: 我要借此机会

translation.en: TO LET EVERYBODY KNOW THAT ME AND TYRONE´S OPEN FOR BUSINESS.
translation.zh: 告诉大家我和泰伦正式开张

translation.en: WE CAN SERVICE ALL YOUR DOPE NEEDS.
translation.zh:
我们可以满足你们
所有的大麻需要

translation.en: GOOD PRICES, TOO, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.zh: 价格合理 明白我的意思吧？

translation.en: SEE, WE DON´T NEED YOU HERE.
translation.zh: 看 我们这里不需要你

translation.en: WELL, I´M NOT LEAVING.
translation.zh: 我不会离开

translation.en: AND I´M NOT AFRAID TO USE THIS GUN.
translation.zh: 我可不怕用这把枪

translation.en: I THINK YOU´RE AFRAID. FUCK AFRAID!
translation.zh:
-我觉得你害怕
-去他妈的害怕！

translation.en: YOU THINK I WON´T PULL THE TRIGGER?
translation.zh: 你觉得我不会扣动扳机？

translation.en: MY BRAIN TELLS MY FINGER TO PULL THE TRIGGER, AND BOOM!
translation.zh:
我的大脑告诉手指扣动扳机
就会砰！

translation.en: HAPPENS JUST LIKE THAT. WELL, LET ME TALK TO YOUR BRAIN, THEN.
translation.zh:
-就那么简单
-让我跟你的大脑谈谈

translation.en: HEY, CYRUS´S BRAIN, PULL THE TRIGGER!
translation.zh: 赛勒斯的大脑 扣动扳机！

translation.en: OH, FUNNY GUY.
translation.zh: 你真有意思

translation.en: PULL THE TRIGGER! DO IT!
translation.zh: 扣动扳机！ 动手啊！

translation.en: DO IT!
translation.zh: 动手！

translation.en: [ SCOFFS ] YOU´RE NOT GONNA DO IT, MAN. CYRUS, YOU FUCKING DICK!
translation.zh:
-你不敢动手
-赛勒斯 你是个笨蛋！

translation.en: SHUT UP!
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: WHY DON´T YOU DO YOURSELF A FAVOR?
translation.zh: 你为什么不给自己帮个忙？

translation.en: YOU´RE NOT FROM THE PARK, MAN. YOU DON´T BELONG HERE.
translation.zh: 你不是这里的人 不属于这里

translation.en: THIS IS MY FAMILY.
translation.zh: 这是我的家

translation.en: WHY DON´T YOU GET OUT OF HERE?
translation.zh: 为什么不离开这里？

translation.en: I DON´T NEED THIS SHIT ANYWAY.
translation.zh: 反正这我不需要这东西

translation.en: CHUMP CHANGE.
translation.zh: 不值几个钱

translation.en: THANKS FOR GETTING RID OF CYRUS FOR US, JULIAN.
translation.zh:
谢谢你帮我们赶走了赛勒斯
朱利安

translation.en: NOW IF YOU COULD JUST HELP STRAIGHTEN RICKY OUT,
translation.zh: 如果你能帮我们管管瑞奇

translation.en: WE´D BE ALL SET.
translation.zh: 我们就更放心了

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, EVERYBODY, PARTY´S OVER.
translation.zh: 好了 聚会结束了

translation.en: LET´S GO HOME.
translation.zh: 都回家吧

translation.en: WELCOME BACK, JULIAN.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 朱利安

translation.en: FUCK OFF, MR. LAHEY!
translation.zh: 滚开 莱希先生

translation.en: COME ON, RANDY. LET´S GO WRITE THIS UP.
translation.zh: 来吧 兰迪 咱们去写报告

translation.en: ALL IN ALL, I THINK WE HAD A PRETTY GOOD DAY TODAY, GUYS.
translation.zh: 总的说来 我觉得今天很不错

translation.en: IT´S TIME TO HAVE A FEW DRINKS, SIT DOWN, TURN THAT THING OFF.
translation.zh:
该喝上几杯了
坐下 关掉那个东西

translation.en: MAN, I´M SORRY TO INTERRUPT YOUR TV SHOW.
translation.zh: 对不起打断你的电视秀

translation.en: I´VE GOT NOWHERE TO GO, JULIAN.
translation.zh: 我没地方去了 朱利安

translation.en: ME AND LUCY ARE ALL DONE, AND MY DAD´S DRUNK.
translation.zh: 我和露西分手 我爸爸喝醉了

translation.en: I WAS JUST WONDERING IF I COULD MAYBE SLEEP IN YOUR CAR OR SOMETHING, MAN.
translation.zh:
我在想能不能睡在你车里
或是什么地方

translation.en: I GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
translation.zh: 我没地方去了

translation.en: THANKS, JULIAN.
translation.zh: 谢谢 朱利安

translation.en: I CAN´T BELIEVE HE´S STILL OUT THERE.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信他还在那儿

translation.en: FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS, I PROMISED MYSELF TO STAY AWAY FROM HIM.
translation.zh:
过去18个月里
我都在发誓要摆脱他

translation.en: I DON´T KNOW. HE´S A GOOD GUY.
translation.zh: 我不知道 他是个好人

translation.en: TAKE IT EASY, JULIAN. I´M LEAVING.
translation.zh: 别担心 朱利安 我会离开的

translation.en: -RELAX, RICKY, RELAX. -I JUST GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
translation.zh:
-放松 瑞奇 放松
-我只是无处可去了

translation.en: HERE, I GOT YOU SOME HOT DOGS.
translation.zh: 拿着 我给你拿了些热狗

translation.en: I GOT YOU SOME VODKA.
translation.zh: 还有一些伏特加

translation.en: I APPRECIATE THIS, JULIAN, BUT, I MEAN, I DON´T NEED YOUR CHARITY.
translation.zh:
谢谢 朱利安
但我不需要你的施舍

translation.en: RICKY, IT´S OKAY, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 瑞奇 没关系的 好吗？

translation.en: HERE, YOU CAN SLEEP IN THE CAR FOR TWO DAYS.
translation.zh: 你可以在车里睡两天

translation.en: THANKS, BUDDY. I APPRECIATE THAT.
translation.zh: 谢谢 伙计 我很感激

translation.en: I WANT YOU OUT OF THAT CAR IN TWO DAYS, THOUGH, RICKY, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh:
两天后你就得离开那辆车
行吗 瑞奇？

translation.en: NO MORE THAN TWO WEEKS. I PROMISE, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh:
不超过两个星期
我发誓 好吗？
